data.name: OpenGloves - Force Feedback Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a demonstration of Force Feedback with the SteamVR Unity Interaction Example.

To get started, add this DLC to your account and launch OpenGloves, selecting the "Play Force Feedback Demo". The demo game should launch and you will be able to interact with objects with Force Feedback.
data.about_the_game:
This is a demonstration of Force Feedback with the SteamVR Unity Interaction Example.

To get started, add this DLC to your account and launch OpenGloves, selecting the "Play Force Feedback Demo". The demo game should launch and you will be able to interact with objects with Force Feedback.
data.short_description: OpenGlove Force Feedback Demo demonstrates the possibilities of Force Feedback (resistance to finger movement) in games using VR Gloves.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
